title: Missing property "SKPaint.PathEffect" and "DashPathEffect"
body:
Hi,

I need to draw dashed lines.
As it seems, in Skia there is a property "PathEffect" on the SKPaint object.
see: https://bugs.chromium.org/p/skia/issues/detail?id=874

or directly the source for dashpatheffect:
https://github.com/google/skia/blob/master/gm/dashing.cpp

Rendering dashed lines is very important to us :-|
